lead_paragraph: DAVIS--Edward J. In deep sorrow for the loss of Ed Davis, a very special man, and with heartfelt sympathy to his beloved husband, Tom Phillips. With love, Penny 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DAVIS, EDWARD J

snippet: DAVIS--Edward J. In deep sorrow for the loss of Ed Davis, a very special man, and with heartfelt sympathy to his beloved husband, Tom Phillips. With love, Penny 1/3
